check.name: AuthorOriginatorPresent
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Author Originator concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept AuthorOriginator is present."
if(AuthorOriginator is not None and len(str(AuthorOriginator)) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "AuthorOriginator concept is not present"
return False

def call(): global output global status

return False
